For the money I really can't complain, and when you're going from standard def to HD, you really can't complain.  I thing it has just 2 HDMI ports, one for the cable box and one using my Chromecast.  Frees up a lot more space, can't set the cable box on top of the tv anymore though.  I would recommend it and would be open to purchasing another for a spare bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Rob H.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my bedroom and replaced an old box-style, CRT TV. The picture and sound are perfect for what I need in my bedroom. Is this the best TV out there? No. But, for a bedroom setting AND for such a reasonable price, it fits my needs perfectly. It was easy to set up and has a lot to offer at this price point. I'll probably buy a cheap soundbar to amplify the sound a little bit, but I'm overall very happy with this purchase and would recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: good overall
Reviews.Author: Reg
Reviews.Content: Not a bad set. Bought as a gift. But watched it after we set it up. Not the best. But definetly not a bad TV. Especially the price.

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the price.
Reviews.Author: Aspen
Reviews.Content: Great pictures and no gap when you flip from channel to Channel.  Clear picture, easy to set up.  Was skeptical at first, but overall very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Looks good
Reviews.Author: Ms*Dee623
Reviews.Content: Hung on my wall 50" had to push couch back picture so good sounds good was easy to set up

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: Lady Texas
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture, This is in my sons room and he really enjoys it and all the attachments with it. He has added a speaker system with his DVD and made a surround sound so he can enjoy Blurays etc.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: Julianne M Koski
Reviews.Content: This was so great for me. It went in my office and I could not be more pleased. it arrived on time and in great condition. I was a little concerned at first because the actual TV Box was just wrapped with a piece of cardboard around it, but it was fine and works like a dream.

Reviews.Title: Fine
Reviews.Author: C. H. Morrison "VintageGeek"
Reviews.Content: For an inexpensive HDTV, it met my expectations for picture, setup, etc. I've used it with my laptop from the office at home and also as an over the air HDTV via attenae. Worked fine.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: MYLES
Reviews.Content: The tv hasnangreat picture and excellent clarity! Definitely recommend! It has a slim design and thin frame. Would buy again!

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV!
Reviews.Author: Tomasz Kaczmarek
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing.  It's slim and has great pictures. For $300 on a 39 inch you cannot do better!

Reviews.Title: Wife Likes it
Reviews.Author: CL "C"
Reviews.Content: Well, when the wife's happy....  Works well, connected to our cable TV just fine (we don't use the set top box with this TV).  Picture looks good, but I didn't "study" it like many people clearly do - we're happy with it.

Reviews.Title: We enjoy it
Reviews.Author: R. ZHANG
Reviews.Content: I am not really picky for TVs so I can give much analysis to the TV regarding color brightness etc. But I see no problem, and my family likes it so that worth 4 star to me

Reviews.Title: Good clear picture and sound
Reviews.Author: Betty Key
Reviews.Content: This tv has a clear picture and sound. We are happy with it so far. (It replaced an almost 12 year old TV so it definitely is better!)

Reviews.Title: Good function, great picture, excellent value
Reviews.Author: Apple Newbie
Reviews.Content: For this price point and functional list, this TV is awesome. The streaming content shows as 720p but blueray looks fantastic on this screen size.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Justice
Reviews.Content: I love the TV.  It is a good size for my room.  The picture is fabulous.  The sound is much better than I expected, after reading reviews of other flat screen tv's.  I am more than satisfied with this purchase.  This is my second Toshiba television and I am sold on this brand.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Riledup "Jim"
Reviews.Content: We had to limit the size of our new TV so it would fit into the entertainment center. I already had a small 20 inch Toshiba in the bedroom, and it had a very nice picture if you turned off the Dynamic lighting feature. The LU1350 also had a VGA input, which could use with the PC that acts as my DVR for recording over the air TV signals. That left the 3 hdmi connections for my other equipment. I have a displayport to hdmi cable on order, so I won't need to use the VGA for much longer. Very loud volume, so using hooking it up to a home theater isn't necessary. Cheap remote control, so I swapped the much nicer one that came with my 20 inch years ago.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the money!
Reviews.Author: sslami "sslamster"
Reviews.Content: I initially had a 37" 720p Toshiba LCD, which I replaced with a 42" 1080p Toshiba LCD, which was then replaced by this 50" Toshiba 1080p LED TV.  I still have the 37" and 42", they both still work great; they have just been redeployed to the bedrooms.Because I have had such good luck with Toshiba TV's in the past, I decided to continue with the Toshiba brand for my new 50" TV and I have not been disappointed.  The funny thing is that one of my wants in a new TV was to have RCA audio outputs as I have an old Sony SA-VA analog audio system, and Toshiba was one of the few that still had analog audio outputs in their TV's.I use this set as my main TV and I am very happy with it.  It has 3 HDMI inputs (my 42" set had 4 HDMI inputs) and I have connected to it my cable STB/DVR, Xbox one, and Toshiba HD-DVD player.  My Xbox one has a built in blu-ray player so I was able to eliminate the need for my PS3.Aesthetically, I really like this TV.  The bezel is much thinner than my old set but not quite as thin as some of the new LED's out right now.  However, this TV is also much less expensive than some of the other newer LED sets.  The base is sort of flimsy and I was worried that, based on previous reviews, the TV would "droop" or wobble in response to vibration or someone walking near the TV.  Fortunately, that has not been the case.  Despite the fact that the base could be sturdier, it sits even on my TV stand and does not wobble.  The TV base unfortunately does not swivel like the 42" set I had, but the wide viewing angle makes up for that.Inputs and outputs are perfect for me.  I needed at least 3 HDMI inputs because I don't have an audio receiver.  My audio system is old and analog, but still works great.  Switching between inputs is very fast, much faster than either of my older Toshiba LCD's.  The menu is also a bit more user friendly.  There are plenty of options for customizing the picture and audio quality.  The built in speakers are surprisingly good.When you feed a high quality source into this TV the results are exceptional.  For example, when I use my Xbox one for gaming or Netflix, the picture is (in my opinion) exceptional.  The same holds true when watching HD-DVD's or DVD's via my HD-DVD player.  When viewing the cable set top box, the quality of picture really depends on the channel.  Some channels are better than others, despite the fact that they are all supposed to be HD channels.  I don't think that this TV does much in terms of video manipulation, so the better the source the better the picture.  However, many of my cable channels through the set top box do look fantastic.  Again, not the fault of the TV.  Coming from an LCD TV, the colors and blacks are more vibrant on this TV.  Not sure if it's due to the LED technology or just the fact that this is a brand new TV.Overall, I am really impressed with this TV.  I was kind of worried that the quality wouldn't be as good as my 42" Regza LCD based on previous reviews, but I have been pleasantly surprised.  The picture is fantastic, the audio is very good, and the looks are amazing.  I spent quite a bit of time calibrating my 42" and 37" Toshiba LCD's with DV Essentials on HD-DVD.  I really didn't need to even do that with this set as it looks pretty good right out of the box.  It is also significantly lighter than my 42" LCD.  I highly recommend this TV!As always, Amazon was awesome with super fast shipping and delivery.  I'm 100% happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Works well so far
Reviews.Author: Camera User
Reviews.Content: It has a very good picture, and a very wide viewing angle. The wide angle was important to us, because we use it in a motorhome, where we have to look up at it, and often sit to one side or the other. It's light, about 8 pounds, also important in the motorhome, where it's subject to driving forces, and it must be easily restrained should there be an accident.We've only had it a short time, so can not say much else.

Reviews.Title: Nice and bright
Reviews.Author: Bingo Tailspin
Reviews.Content: The TV is very bright and clear.  The size is bigger than expected and great for a bedroom.  Very nice price for 1080p.  Kind of a cool base that is more than most HDTVs provide.

Reviews.Title: I purchased this TV as a Christmas present for my mother
Reviews.Author: Cherri
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV as a Christmas present for my mother. The TV arrived in good time. The TV itself is very nice, with a great picture. My mother was very pleased as were we.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: carlos morris
Reviews.Content: small but image it is good, the only thing i do not like, it does not come with regular audio video input/output to hook up a regular DVD. it is all high definition now

Reviews.Title: Exactly what we wanted
Reviews.Author: L. Breheny "LB"
Reviews.Content: This TV is the perfect size to view movies, play games, etc. We are so enjoying it - I'm spreading the word!

Reviews.Title: excellent quality; difficlt to set up
Reviews.Author: mercedes montgomery
Reviews.Content: The Toshiba 39'' led TV (or compter, or anything, really) is an excellent product.  Far better picture than or previous Toshiba set(pre-digital).  I am having trouble getting the picture the right size on the screen.  It seems that there should be more adjustment for width, mainly, and over-all fit of the received signal image to the screen.  Often it is obvious that there are words  that run off the end of the screen, and when I quickly try to select a different picture size, it is still not there completely.Color adjustment  and other tweeks are effective in viewing non- HD signal; we don't have HD signal yet.Sound comes out the bottom of the set and is somewhat 'tinny', so an amplified speaker system makes for much better sound quality.Overall, though, I expect this will be a good choice for the money, since our other Toshiba products have outperformed all previous electronics.

Reviews.Title: Fits my needs perfectly
Reviews.Author: Hans Probst
Reviews.Content: Love it for gaming. My Wii U has never looked better. Perfect for people who want a TV that's just a great TV and nothing else.

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: Farhana Sumi
Reviews.Content: Nice and slim and good sound !! It was my New Year gift from someone special....I like this TV, This is the second Toshiba in our home...

Reviews.Title: Great TV and price!
Reviews.Author: Thomas pendergast
Reviews.Content: Great buy!  Better price than all places researched. Easy to set up. Great picture. Just the right size for our bedroom. Very pleased with this purchase. Would recommend this TV to anyone looking for a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the size and price.
Reviews.Author: Jason Bisenius
Reviews.Content: My intended purpose for this unit is to double as a second PC monitor and HD TV.Pros:HD picture and colors are awesome.Like the multiple inputs: Three HDMI inputs, a USB port, a high-def PC port, and a ColorStream HD component input.Speakers sound good for a slim screen.Easy to set up and use.Light weight.Cons:There is a 1/2 mute feature so you have to push mute twice for full mute. This is an annoying, unneeded feature.As a PC monitor it works fine for the most part but when using a CAD program the pixels seem too big, definitely not HD quality.With PC speakers plugged into the TV, the remote does not control the sound level of the PC speakers.Overall good TV, just not the best.

Reviews.Title: volume troubles
Reviews.Author: pjs
Reviews.Content: We took our Sony and moved it replacing it with the 58" Toshiba.  This is not a smart tv as they are called today so I call it a dumb tv.  Does just what I want, a fantastic tv to watch and that is all it does.  I could not give it 5 stars which it deserves because of the sound volume of the tv.  You have to listen to the tv at a volume setting of 1 up to 4 depending on the channel you are watching.  Toshiba says it is not the tv because my DVD is listened to at normal volume settings.  I had Cox cable come out and replace the box same problem, used another box, still the same problem, too loud.  Still when all is said and done it is not a huge problem, just shouldn't be that loud.  There are some times that it is too loud but the tv has a 1/2 mute feature that will take a volume setting of 1 down to 1/2 .

Reviews.Title: Super gaming TV
Reviews.Author: Chris M. Cooper
Reviews.Content: Found this tv on IGN. Amazon had the best price and the shipping was almost a week faster than the estimation. Easy set up with and switching between Xbox 360 and XboxOne. Great picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Excellent screen for the money
Reviews.Author: Dan S
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research a few months ago and found this Toshiba to be the best value at the time. The picture is clear and bright. We stream using an Apple TV and find the 1080p at 60Hz to be all we need.Highly recommend for the budget conscious looking for a quality screen without the bigger brand's inflated prices.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift.
Reviews.Author: manuel
Reviews.Content: I got this for my girlfriend since she needed to upgrade from her 480p t.v. I set it up for her and she loved it. The menu is easy for her to adjust the visual settings since two of them are on the controller itself. The picture is good on this t.v that I think I have created a gaming monster with it. She said she can read stuff now and the images look good. Words are from her but not quoted. I was actually considering buying for myself, might do in a few weeks.

Reviews.Title: Clear Picture
Reviews.Author: S. Nagel
Reviews.Content: I am using as a computer monitor and it works well.  Easy to hook up and a very clear picture

Reviews.Title: Very good television, crappy remote
Reviews.Author: Weldon Berger
Reviews.Content: I bought this particular TV because I've had good luck with Toshiba products and the price was quite good.  I've had it about four months now and am happy with it.Setup was very easy. The screen isn't the highest resolution, but at this size -- I got the 32" version -- there isn't all that much difference between the 720p and 1080p, at least for me. The picture is lovely, with true colors and good contrast. The higher refresh rate makes sports and other action programming much more enjoyable than with the standard 60hz rate. The sound is decent (although you're always better off running audio through some decent external speakers). The picture looks good from a fairly sharp viewing angle. The unit is lightweight, which makes it easy to mount on a wall.I would give the TV five stars were it not for the remote, which is flimsy and doesn't include the channel guide feature that our little off-brand kitchen TV remote has. That's annoying because we only use a digital antenna so we don't have a program listing channel as one does with cable or satellite providers. At some point we'll replace the remote with a universal one. Even with that gripe, though, I wouldn't hesitate to recommend the TV so long as the price isn't much more than $200.

Reviews.Title: Decent picture for the price
Reviews.Author: B. Adams "BA"
Reviews.Content: First impression was not very good.  Seemed cheap compared to my Samsung and Sony.  After getting everything hooked up I decided the picture was decent for what I paid, $299.  The stand is woobly at best.  The remote does not light up and the buttons are3 small.  For what I'm using it for it's just ok.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 23L 1350U LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: 1slydude
Reviews.Content: The Toshiba 23L 1350U 23-inch 1080p LED HDTV works great.  The picture quality is excellent.  I purchased two of these Toshiba LED HDTV's and I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: it's 'ok'
Reviews.Author: Mr. Ronald Sach
Reviews.Content: no great shakes... picture/audio 'ok' ... used in bedroom so 'ok'... would not use as main viewing tv... have seen much better TV's in this size...

Reviews.Title: Great picture, 32-inch at 120Hz
Reviews.Author: Eric S.
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my mother. Good value for money with this TV. Crisp and clear picture, even in action movies, however I hasn't been used for gaming so can't really assess the 120Hz refresh rate properly. 32-inch is a good size for most purposes and most people, so nothing wrong with making this your main TV. Sound is poor, but you can pretty much connect it to any stereo you have and that will take care of that. I will consider this model for my new studio apartment, where space is at a premium.

Reviews.Title: Nice Toshiba TV
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: I was able to get an excellent price on this TV about 6 weeks ago and I really enjoy it . Sound is perfectly fine and the picture is very good without HD cable service . I use the Movie mode for TV watching and found the picture to be too contrasty in the other two modes . Minor issue is that no instruction manual is provided . It's been really nice for general viewing .

Reviews.Title: A good value for money small LED TV (32-inch)
Reviews.Author: Deovrat BAPAT
Reviews.Content: TV is as expected! no complaints! Like the picture quality for the HD channels! The only flip side i noticed is that it is not as thin as I had imagined it to be! But for a 3 inch thickness, it doesn't really matter, as long as the TV picture is good and crisp - which it is.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32L1350U 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Ernest C
Reviews.Content: love it, 3 HDMI input, one USB, quality pictures, got it for $210, free shipping and no tax, come with tuner will recognize HD cable signals, PC audio input that's puls, I can use it as PC monitor also stereo and digital output are great to hock up with receiver. Toshiba in Asia is very sold elect's company, quality well last years of use the product.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Gary Eldridge
Reviews.Content: Great picture and sound. Practically plug and play, I will definately buy again. The energy efficient use is a bonus.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, pretty low price!
Reviews.Author: Hodo
Reviews.Content: The TV is great--Amazon's LOW-PRICE GUARANTEE is difficult to understand and complicated to make a claim with.  The picture takes a little time to properly tweak to your personal liking for each input, but it is well worth the time.  It has lots of inputs and a bright vibrant picture with plenty of ways to maximize viewing older equipment with very good quality.  The viewing angles are amazing compared to HDTVs of just a couple of years ago.  The technology has come a long way--even for a 'budget set' like this one.  Don't be put off by the negative reviews that compare this with sets two or three times the price--this TV has a better picture than almost anything you could have bought a few years ago.  This TV can be gotten at a very good price many places and Amazon may be difficult to work with if you make a price match claim.  I highly recommend you buy this TV if you don't need all the bells and whistles of a 'Smart TV' but make sure Amazon really has the best price because getting them to price match after the sale may take a lot of time and effort!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: norm morrison
Reviews.Content: this I wonderful tv!! It has great sound as well as a great picture. Has plenty of inputs and jacks. easy to hook up dvd player. I definitely would recommend this tv for the price!!! I love this tv!!!

Reviews.Title: Great little TV!
Reviews.Author: Ann Marie Erickson
Reviews.Content: Great TV - LOVE Toshiba. It is the second Toshiba set purchased for my new home. Easy to operate and great little TV. Coun't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with the product
Reviews.Author: Lisa H. Richards
Reviews.Content: Arrived before anticipated arrival date and easy to install.  This is the second Toshiba that we have bought and we are pleased with both.

Reviews.Title: A home run for Toshiba!
Reviews.Author: M. D. Oakley Jr. "Wickedteercroquet"
Reviews.Content: The perfect size for the application, superior stereo sound, easy attachment to available cable service, terrific color with adjustment capability.

Reviews.Title: Working well.
Reviews.Author: An ordinary consumer
Reviews.Content: Was sold and shipped by Amazon. Received as expected. The delivering company (Pilot) has scheduled time for delivery. They brought it in, unpacked, assembled and connected to the outlet. Since it was for a retired person, he was glad to see it working. Of course, it still needed adjustments in terms of settings and I also had to disassemble and re-assemble for him because the post still had blue plastic on it, but it was not a big deal.Please note, if you have children, make an effort to secure this TV either on the wall, or at least with a metal cable that must be put through a special loop on the back of the TV. The TV itself is resting on just one post and is not very stable (like the most of the big TVs) for an environment with children.We've connected an HTPC to it via a BlueRigger High Speed HDMI to DVI Adapter Cable (6.6 Feet/ 2 Meters) and so far so good. Also connected a DVD player via Component connection. So far everything is working.We'll see if it will be a long-lasting product or not, but as of today it is worth its price.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for my daughter...
Reviews.Author: Robin Selesky
Reviews.Content: Great picture at a reasonable price....was actually expecting it to be much worse quality considering what I have paid in the past.  Not bad for a second bedroom or for your child

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: James Reece
Reviews.Content: Very good quality picture and has the hook ups I need.  The base is a little shaky.  I am satisfied with the unit.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Ashley W
Reviews.Content: The picture is good. Good sound quality. Has a reliable stand and was easy to set up. It has no motion blur and was an overall good buy.

Reviews.Title: A gift that was enjoyed.
Reviews.Author: J. Jones
Reviews.Content: Gift for my Grandmothers bedroom.  I have not seen it but she loves it says it has a beautiful picture.

Reviews.Title: Easy Set-Up, Met Expectations
Reviews.Author: Joseph H.
Reviews.Content: I'd give it a 5 star but can't seem to get the whole picture to work on Wide screen.  Perhaps it is user error but I'd thought the manual could be more helpful.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: james cole
Reviews.Content: The television is awesome. The size of it combined with the price makes it an amazing buy. Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I Like Toshiba. Ive Had Others With Good Luck. If Your Used To 1080p Like I Am  Dont Go Back To 720 P Tv You Won't Be Satisfied.Picture Just Isnt As Sharp. But Thats On Me Not Tv.

Reviews.Title: great tv for a great price
Reviews.Author: Phillip V.
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great! The sound is good. And it has a nice design to it. And its a good size for a good price, I recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "HPS"
Reviews.Content: Great size, clarity for an office or bedroom TV.  Was relatively easy to put together (on the stand) and was very easy to connect to HDMI, satellite/cable.  I'm not handy person so that's saying something!

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Good Price
Reviews.Author: Sharron
Reviews.Content: This tv was purchased for my elderly mother who wanted to upgrade from a small, box tv. She was excited to get a large flatscreen tv that she could see more clearly at a great price. She didn't need all the bells and whistles of the more expensive sets so this is perfect for her.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV and great price
Reviews.Author: Marte "InfMom"
Reviews.Content: Extremely easy to hook up, crystal clear picture, and even the built-in speakers sound good. Comparing it to the crummy old CRT it replaced is like night and day.  :)

Reviews.Title: nice unit
Reviews.Author: TOM CURRIN
Reviews.Content: nice unit--like it real well--32" is just to small-but that was my mistake-should have at least gotten a 40 "

Reviews.Title: A great selection for any family.
Reviews.Author: Jerry Straughan
Reviews.Content: It came to our door on time, we unpacked the TV, we plugged it in, made the required clicker program with the instruction's with ease, turned it on, and then watched a movie in beautiful color on cable.  Now, who will ask for more?  Great for watching what one wants!! --- Thanks Toshiba and Amazon ---------- jerry straughan

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and sound quality.  Works great with older A/V devices.  Have not tried all the features yet.  So far everything is working great!

Reviews.Title: Great TV or Dual Monitor
Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: High Quality, I had a toshiba 32 inch tv for 5 years and passed it on to my dad. Fits great on my dorm desk. I use it for netflix and a dual monitor for my mac. Has worked flawlessly so far.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the money
Reviews.Author: Tony Perkin
Reviews.Content: I bought this for motorhome that has been remodeled, good tv with some excellent menu driven features, only 720p but it still looks good in HD, there is a small pause between channel changing

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kiwi
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I needed. I have it in my dorm, it's perfect size and I can easily hook my laptop up to it with an Hdmi cord when I want to watch a movie

Reviews.Title: Nearly perfect TV
Reviews.Author: Bella Luna
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with this Toshiba TV. The 20L1350U was easy to set up; It's relatively light weight. Though I have  severe arthritis, I was able to unpack it and put the screen and its stand together by myself. Setting up the channels was a breeze. The remote's buttons are a decent size and it's functions were very easy to figure out. It does not come with a manual; you have to go the Toshiba's web site. I downloaded the pdf file and printed it,but truthful, I had very little reason to consult it. I had some difficulty with the connection to a  old JVC vcr/dvd player. It would not play. I had fooled around with the TV's settings and just by RESETTING to the default settings, it now plays the videos. I have not yet been able to RECORD on it but I just have not taken the time to figure out what I'm doing wrong. My vcr/dvd combo does not have a HDMI port (which I believe it the best connection ); so I used the red, green, white cables to connect it. PLEASE NOTE; HDMI cables and red,green,white cables do Not come with this set. I bought them separately. Also be aware of Amazon's TV Price Guarantee ; if you buy through Amazon and later find the same TV at a cheaper price, Amazon will make up the difference . I had the Tv less than 2 weeks and I'm very happy. The picture /color is perfect, sound is great. I'll have more to write after I have had it for a while.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful set for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought it for our bedroom. Took a very short time to hook it up. So far I am very please. Fast shipping too!

Reviews.Title: Great TV..
Reviews.Author: M.Jones
Reviews.Content: Great tv.. perfect for a spare bedroom.. color n quality great excellent for the price.. I totally would recommend this product..

Reviews.Title: Screen was COMPLETELY busted
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: Ship a tv in its original box with no other protection and it arrives destroyed……DUH!  Returned it and never re ordered.  Customer service was very nice to deal with though.  I sent them pictures of the severe damage and they had fed ex pick it back up. All of this could have been prevented though, had they just taken the time to put the original box in another, with peanuts or other packing material.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the money
Reviews.Author: ak
Reviews.Content: Excellent speakers for a tv this size, very nice picture and light weight so its easily portable. Best tv for the priceline.

Reviews.Title: Very good picture!
Reviews.Author: debra
Reviews.Content: It arrived very quickly and was very easy to set up no problem noted at this time. The picture is good bought two of them one for a bedroom and a sunroom.

Reviews.Title: Just what they said it would be!
Reviews.Author: DEBORAH GREENBURG
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the product.It fits just right in the spot it was intended for!It looks great!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Takeshi Arai
Reviews.Content: This TV is very good for me. And the display of this TV is clear and sharp. So, cost perfomance is good.

Reviews.Title: toshiba
Reviews.Author: cms st paul
Reviews.Content: the TV is great, our last TV was the last of the tube models, very heavy. This one was easier to bring into the house, easy to set up, and it has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic monitor, well worth the price!
Reviews.Author: Andrew Simmons
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor to run training videos for my Empower Network business, and couldn't be more pleased with the sharpness or clarity of it. It arrived over night, on a Saturday; installed flawlessly; and worked right out of the box. Easy to use, great value. Will likely buy a few more of them as the business grows.

Reviews.Title: First impression is good
Reviews.Author: Mícheál É. Ó Máille
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the occasional use in my travel camper, so 1080p wasn't an issue as was getting HD with 120Hz refresh rate which this has. I hooked up my BD to it and the picture was very good. I also used its speakers and they were good.I can't comment about TV reception as there is none where I have my camper. I brought it home as I figure I should use it during the warranty period and will hook it up to antenna and then edit my review only if the picture for OTA TV is not as good as it is with the BD player.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Gertrude Muro
Reviews.Content: This television is easy to install and to handle.  Besides, it is not necessary to read the instructions since the TV set is operated as most TVs are.

Reviews.Title: FALSE ADVERTISING
Reviews.Author: Randal Steffens
Reviews.Content: When I purchased this TV on September 7, 2013, the listing on Amazon said this TV was 120 Hz. I thought hey good deal, now that I am back to purchase a 2nd one obviously that claim was false. This TV is now it is listed as 60 Hz. I fault the TV industry for coming up with new terms to push lesser quality panels, and Amazon for the incorrect information that was put in the original listing note that incorrect information is still in the listing as I type this. The accuracy of information in product listings and materials needs to be accurate, as how can buyers make informed decisions with incorrect information. Let me be clear the TV does its job its just not a 120 Hz panel as it is claimed to be

Reviews.Title: Great Deal Amazing Price!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: So I had earned some free gift cards at work and was considering getting a new TV for a while now. Mostly cause I got a Blue Ray player for my birthday and was anxious to be able to watch Netflix in my room. So here I go and I used my gift card, the first TV I wanted was too expensive and I saw this one and went what the heck. I LOVE THIS TV!!!! I have two mute levels, multiple screen options for viewing, the sleep feature is great, the volume is awesome. It was totally easy to set up and came faster then expected and was in perfect condition. It's sleek and pretty and the remote's buttons are big and easy to see even when it's pretty dark. I would totally recommend this TV to anyone who asked me.

Reviews.Title: 50L1350U 50"  I love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Kosoku "kikboxr1"
Reviews.Content: I found this TV at a local brick & mortar store as an open box item.  They had new versions up on the wall where I could check the picture - for the current price of $600 I don't know of any TV on the market that can beat it.  The picture is fantastic.  Very uniform color and backlighting.

Reviews.Title: My new Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Linda J Conklin
Reviews.Content: I received this tv before I expected. That was nice. The tv was everything I expected it to be based on product description. I wall mounted it very easily, hooked up the cable, and voila'...it was perfect. I didn't need to make any adjustments. I was concerned about sound (my last Toshiba tv had terrible sound) but this has really great audio. A thumbs up on all counts!

Reviews.Title: All reviews are subjective
Reviews.Author: xtobot
Reviews.Content: So after reading the reviews on here, this TV sounded like a great budget Panel - no frills. Simple and easy?When I set it up, I noticed the color and depth were underwhelming. It could not be calibrated to anything more then saturated over-toned color. It is not fixable with a proper calibration (which I did)The backlighting will wash out everything at any viewing angle. Not something you will see on display at any retail location, but in the subtle lighting of a home theatre or living room - it sucks out loud.The image is grainy. On images that have no business being grainy, that is all you see. For the price, you get what you pay for:The VGA resolution is severely limited.There are no dedicated Input buttons, just a scrolling menu.When playing media, it will always jump to no signal and display the input label for 10 seconds whenever stopping or starting anything.The enhanced imaging features will create MPEG like artifacts on the most pristine HD content. No other TV I have owned has ever created such garbage from such content.I was very pumped to get this TV, and every step of the way it was truly disappointing.Needless to say, I have returned it and spent $250 more on a Sony Bravia loaded with smart features I don't need - and the panel is BEYOND superior.I was shocked to see what praise it has received in any review I have read, and I am confused as to what people are referencing when looking at this, because it is not good at any price.

Reviews.Title: Picture is great!
Reviews.Author: Suicune
Reviews.Content: I just got my tv yesterday and set everything up. I put in my very first Blu-ray and was blown away by how great the picture was! It was perfect without needing any adjustments. If I had to give it a downside, I would say the lack of HDMI ports but that just means I can't be lazy with my consoles but not a big deal since I won't be switching them around too often.

Reviews.Title: I would buy another one if I needed two.
Reviews.Author: Timothy Palmer
Reviews.Content: I got mine a couple months ago. I got lucky and best buy had it on sale. I paid 179.99. Great buy now seeing it for more. Picture is good. Does alot of different things. I would definately recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Fear not
Reviews.Author: Mixman
Reviews.Content: Plugged in and looked good. Enough volume to hear and acceptable tone. If you want to get techie, there's plenty of adjustments under the hood.

Reviews.Title: Unable to use VCR
Reviews.Author: Lloyd E. Pyles,Jr.
Reviews.Content: Having difficulty programing for VCR use. Owners manual not provide and the online information is too lengthy to print and it is difficult to sort through it for information.

Reviews.Title: It is perfect!
Reviews.Author: Margaret A. Miller
Reviews.Content: It is just the right size to fit a niche in the kitchen...and it is a perfect picture too! Could not be happier with it!

Reviews.Title: Toshiba The Name says it all
Reviews.Author: Samuel G. Fowler
Reviews.Content: I wish I could find fault with it I feel guilty not buying an American product, but every Toshibaproduct I have bought works well it integrated well with my Toshiba DVD player & my Toshiba laptop

Reviews.Title: Color not as sharp as I expected
Reviews.Author: Janice C. Carlson "casino queen"
Reviews.Content: I have a smaller Toshiba TV and the color is vibrant, closeups are awesome. This one doesn't have the same sharp color. Have tried tweaking it a bit. Finally went back to factory settings and it is ok, but could be better.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product espedially for the price.
Reviews.Author: John Roberts
Reviews.Content: This TV has a clear crisp display with good natural colors.  Relatively light and easy to handle in the setup.  Quick and easy setup

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: clbrown
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for our daughter.  Great price for the size.  Researched Samsung vs Toshiba............and we made the perfect choice.The item was ordered on a Sunday and was shipped out the next day.........Very satisfied

Reviews.Title: Excellent small but beautiful and outstanding HDTV and 1080p.
Reviews.Author: Edward
Reviews.Content: This HDTV is great!!! from TOSHIBA. My first Toshiba HDTV. I love it, it is on all day. Very power efficient, only 20 Watts. If you need a small HDTV, this is the one. Go ahead and buy, you will be very happy. Plus, from Amazon, you get the great customer service and fast delivery.

Reviews.Title: False Advertisement
Reviews.Author: MP Veteran
Reviews.Content: It is advertised as ClearScan 120hz. It is only 60hz at 720p and 480p. The ClearScan 120hz is only available at 480i... and even then it doesn't work. The entire 1350U and 6200U TV's are only 60hz unless taken off HD mode.... DO NOT BUY unless you want to be ripped off.

Reviews.Title: Video went out way too early
Reviews.Author: Joe rak
Reviews.Content: wrong, just to find hundreds of people with the same issue.  You may be one of the ones that keep your video, but if you like a "robust" TV that will last more than 5 years, you might want to check elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Reese
Reviews.Content: I would have given it four & a half stars. It's great except for a few neurotically niggling issues I have.For one, I have to press the power button on the remote more than once for it to turn on.Now, I realize that doesn't reeally seem like that big of a deal. But for me, at times it can be exceedingly irritating.& sometimes when I can't sleep I like to only hear the sound of the t.v. but have the screen almost black with tcm on.With my old dinosaur I could achieve this, with this guy I can have the back light & everything else be at zero & it's still quite bright.A more sane issue I have with it is the speakers. They rattle with bassy sounds when the device volume is pretty low.I did purchase external speakers- I bought this thing with the intent of getting external speakers any way since it had that capability. But I have to turn the volume on the t.v. off, get up, turn on the speakers & manually adjust accordingly.Which, in this time of the "I want it now" instant gratification attitude, it can be pretty obnoxious. But typing it now, I'm annoyedwith myself for complaining about it soo yeah. hahaPicture is great, but I'm not really all that picky. Evidently, since I went with a 720 instead of a 1080.1080 is just too clear for my taste. Everyone looks like crap. I end up focusing on how much make up theyhave caked on their faces & it's all just too distracting.It's very pretty. Compared to my super old one it's quite fancy, & large. People tried to get me to buy a bigger one claiming thissize wouldn't be big enough, but I feel size-wise, it gets the job done. I have a big enough screen to where it's not too small,but it's not excessively large where I feel like a douche bag just for owning it either.Anyway, I'm ranting. It's a nice set, very nice. I'm glad I did my research & went with this one instead of the samsung thathad like no inputs or outputs to do cool stuff with. Like plug my macbook into. That's pretty awesome in itself.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Dude Who Tries Everthing
Reviews.Content: The Best T.V ive seen and when ups doesn't break it everthing works! ive had mine for a few months now and a pixle died but its no biggie.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: The color is crisp and the screen is large enough to enjoy football.  Easy to install, and I'm not a techie!

Reviews.Title: great picture, arrived promptly.  Easy to use right out of box
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Only problem was I wanted to use my old DVD and although the connections were shown I had to go to internet and find user guide in order to use my connectors.  It was easy once I found it.  Not everyone has blu ray and html etc.  so would be nice if they would explain how to do the settings as well as the connections on the one page instructions.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Horrible Picture!!!
Reviews.Author: SJJ
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV that I decided to buy just to see what things are like. After reading some reviews, I decided on this trying this one due to how great I thought the Toshiba Laptop looked--a LED to see what the picture quality was like although I had always seen better reviews for plasma. Besides, if it wasn't so great, I could always place it in the guest bedroom where the distance isn't really that close and that's exactly where it will go as soon as I receive the updated plasma set.  The reviews said anything around a 50,000 contrast ratio was considered good but that hasn't proved to be true. Closeup, the picture look like it's raining with streaks all down the picture. The black level is like a jigsaw puzzle either closeup or at distance although it's a slight more tolerable at a distance not good but it blends a bit better. While watching football games, there is way too much ghosting and the players/action is always a blurry and out of focus, especially up close or from a side view...the best picture is straight on at a distance.  The picture size and mode options are nice but the picture will zoom in (to get rid of the black marks across the top and bottom of the screen) and part of the picture is off the screen so they don't work very well. It's was inexpensive (cheap) but definitely not worth the money. This was an eye opening experience and don't trust the reviews given because this one was highly rated but is really a horrible set. I do like the remote and their functions though. It was easy to setup, the frame looks rather nice, nice set of connectors on the backside so all isn't lost.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality TV
Reviews.Author: J S
Reviews.Content: I can't believe Toshiba makes such a poor quality product and that this TV has so many positive reviews. Picture was blurry when there was movement and you can only see clear outlines of peoples faces when they are in a close up. Picture vibrated at bottom of screen. Also  remote was cheap and flimsy with slow change time and only works if you are within in a few feet of tv directly in front of screen. I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture Quality!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly A.
Reviews.Content: You have to love amazon!  I ordered this TV (from amazon) and received the TV with a shattered upper screen.  My heart sank.  I contacted amazon right away and they sent out a replacement TV close to immediately and sent UPS to pick the 1st damaged one up free of charge!  Needless to say when the second TV came (only 2 days later) I was very nervous.  WOW - what a nice TV for the price!  It has a great pictue and was very easy to set up.  So far I am loving it!  The only flaw I could find was the base that you put the TV on - when the TV is attached to the base with the little "pole" it is wobbly but seems to be fine.  I have no regrets about this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Manufacturing Defect Caused Broken Screen  Toshiba 58l1350u
Reviews.Author: AmazonLover "ONLINE.BUYER"
Reviews.Content: I was so excited when I ordered this.  Couldn't wait to get it.  When I unboxed it I found that the frame was not installed around the screen properly.  A tab that should have been in front of the glass was behind the glass, causing the screen to be bowed outward at that spot, which caused it to break there.  Apparently this is a very common problem, since Amazon has stopped shipping them due to high failure/damage rate.  I see another review stating their's was broken in the same place mine was, center top.  Very disappointing.Amazon was great, though.  They had it picked up next day at their expense and issued me a full refund.Still sad though.  I really wanted that tv.

Reviews.Title: It is OK
Reviews.Author: Shannon Thomas
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is good but the sound is terrible. I have to turn it all the way up to hear it in the kitchen which is open to the room it is in. Will probably have to buy a sound board.

Reviews.Title: it was a great present
Reviews.Author: Matthew P.
Reviews.Content: this is a mis represented tv it actually has 120 hz not 60, i bought this for my parents for christmas, great price, beautiful picture! amazing sound dad liked that the best he is getting older!!!!

Reviews.Title: A good TV
Reviews.Author: Mumble "Peace"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my son. He put it in his room. I suppose he is enjoying it very much! It was the right size, and shape for him. He hasn't complained about it yet so, I guess he is enjoying it! SO Far, SO Good!

Reviews.Title: I recommended this product for me 100% positive, I loved this TV
Reviews.Author: XAVIER MENDEZ
Reviews.Content: Thanks for the product, the fast and efficient delivery equipment as described in the picture, this TV experience permiter me see the picture I want to take my case space, high-quality TV without Repentance. preferred.

Reviews.Title: very well
Reviews.Author: Yohen Mendoza
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived as expected, without fail, a day as he said, good price, serious and responsible in all cases recommend!.

Reviews.Title: Good Value for a great TV
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: Worked great right out of the box, very nice clear picture. This was a great deal for the price. The only reason for not being a 5 Star rating was the fact the TV does not swivel on the base.

Reviews.Title: television
Reviews.Author: laura soncrant
Reviews.Content: the screen has a scratch on it and the volume is really bad has to be all the way up to hear.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture quality, subpar sound, awful TV stand, TV leans to one side
Reviews.Author: Lazlo7d7
Reviews.Content: The TV has excellent picture quality, the sound system is below average. TV stand that is supposed to hold the TV upright is really flimsy, the TV leans back and to the side. If you are hanging this tv on a wall then go ahead and buy this tv. If you dont plan on relying on the subpar sound system and hooking it up to and external sound system then its good buy. If you are planning on using the TV stand to hold the tv up, you will have to use books to prop the tv up so that it wont lean over.It surprising to me that they would put the effort into designing a tv and then drop the ball on something simple like a TV stand.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Wreck
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. Good price for lcd without any of the extras. There is no basic video input (yellow cable) for things such as WII. You will need hdmi or the red, blue, green connectors. I got one for my wii for $4.65 so no big deal.

Reviews.Title: love it alot lol
Reviews.Author: D. Anderson "62 cent"
Reviews.Content: I love the way l4d and l4d2 on my xbox360  look on the TV . I love the TV alot lol

Reviews.Title: Toshiba.
Reviews.Author: david n.
Reviews.Content: I like this 23L135OU it has better picture than the 39L135OU that I had bought from walmart.com, Toshiba makes a good TV.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV
Reviews.Author: B. Knowles "infidel1375"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my room in Afghanistan.  The color is great, and the firmware responds well to my game systems.  I would recommend this TV to anyone looking for a nice-looking 32-in TV for under $300.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PIC
Reviews.Author: joshua d shaw
Reviews.Content: YES THE TV'S A LITTLE SMALL BUT FOR MY CAMPER I COULD'NT OF FOUND A BETTER TV. AWESOME PICTURE AND SOUND. WOULD RECOMMEND TO ANYONE FOR ANY WHERE.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Review
Reviews.Author: Grant E. Schumacher "grant614"
Reviews.Content: For a 29 inch with moderate resolution, it knocks your socks off.  A very good value. Have no regrets. Ypu'll love it.

Reviews.Title: my first HDTV
Reviews.Author: David Lund
Reviews.Content: for anyone else who is buying their first hdtv in this price range i can recommend this one.  a problem i noticed a lot of people having with TVs this size and this price was overheating but i use this one for about 1-5 hours a day in the summer and i have had no problems with this or anything else.

Reviews.Title: Still great....
Reviews.Author: Lela Knudson
Reviews.Content: This replaces my "old" Toshiba TV (which was great too).  The pictureis clear, of course and the size fits my room perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Nick Boomhower
Reviews.Content: So far, been about a month of use and its great. I have it mounted on a wall and attached to my computer, splitting the screens and it works fantastically. I had no issues mounting with the Cheetah Mounts ALAMLB. Great picture once I toyed with the settings a little bit. I recommend this TV to anyone looking for a well priced 32' TV.

Reviews.Title: Good Tv
Reviews.Author: Jennifer S
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my kids room. Works great. Takes some getting used to the size as it is not very large for a big room...

Reviews.Title: Its just perfect
Reviews.Author: Linda Todenhagen
Reviews.Content: I made sure the specs on the tv were what I needed and when it came it was just what I wanted.  It is easy to switch from game, to PC, to TV.  The picture is great I could not be happier.  I ordered on Sunday and had it on Friday

Reviews.Title: Nice for price!
Reviews.Author: Coooldad
Reviews.Content: Great features for the price. Quality picture and useful features for the price. Its design is sleek and of good quality.

Reviews.Title: Awesome bang for buck
Reviews.Author: AMCSATX
Reviews.Content: For ~$250 to $275 range you'll be hard pressed to find anything sleeker, and with a nicer picture than this jewel.I swear the picture is better than an $800 Samsung I bought last year !

Reviews.Title: Poor tuner, remote, and mediocre picture
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey
Reviews.Content: I purchased this 39" TV to replace another TV which had I was having some issues with the color on the HDMI inputs (color seemed good otherwise). Thought from the reviews that this would be a better TV and thought since it's a Toshiba, it would be decent quality.Good things are that color representation is decent. Do like that it has the PC input.Things not so great is the PC input only seems to only allow 1366x768 maximum resolution although native resolution of the TV is 1920x1080.Brighter colors seem to get washed out when viewed at an angle.Using the built in tuner, the picture tends to look fuzzy and reminiscent of watching a CRT. Vizio TV (which it replaced) seemed to pull stations in much cleaner and present a sharp picture. I can't seem to do much of anything to improve the picture or reception on the Toshiba.I'm also baffled by the claim of 120hz 'clear picture'. Think I actually notice more blurring/ghosting on this TV than the Vizio.The remote is probably the worst that I've come across in a long time. If it's not pointed directly at the IR receiver on the TV, it doesn't seem to want to work.Lastly, the build quality seems a bit loose and the stand was crooked. Not sure the stand is supposed to swivel at all.I'd probably recommend the Vizio VIZIO E390-A1 39-inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV over the Toshiba, particularly if Vizio can eventually fix the HDMI green color emphasis.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 39" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Anthony J. Cozone
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the tv. Picture quality is excellent. Extremely Easy to use.Price was cheaper than anywhere else I looked.

Reviews.Title: Useless for games
Reviews.Author: Ceisiwr Serith
Reviews.Content: I play DDR on a playstion 2, and Wii Fit on a Wii.  The lag is so bad I can't play either of them on this.  A lot of the reviews say good things about lag, but maybe they're playing games where timing isn't that important.  With games like I play, this TV has made my consoles useless.  Tech support was snarky when I called them, and didn't even ask me if I was using Game mode (I was), so I have to wonder how much they know.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, horrible customer service from buyer.
Reviews.Author: Christopher James
Reviews.Content: The Tv is great, Toshiba is a great brand i've never had problems with their products. I wanted to upgrade once i got this tv and realized that "THE FACTORY DEPOT" has horrible return policies and return timelines. I suggest never buy from this company, try and buy from amazon itself.

Reviews.Title: TV GREAT..STAND IS HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: bobbie mobley
Reviews.Content: SANYO 39" TV 1-1/2 YEARS OLD...WENT OUT COMPLETELY..WENT TO  BEST BUY..BEST  VALUE WAS THE SANSUNG39" L135OU..BROUGHT IT HOME..MY SON SET IT UP.BEAUTIFULPICTURE, QUALITY EXCELLENT..TURNED TO WALK OUT OF ROOM AND JUST THE BREEZE FROM WALKING BY..MADE THE TV WOBBLE LEFT AND RIGHT..IT LOOKS AS IF IT IS TAKINGOFF FROM A RUNWAY...IF I TIPTOE IN AND OUT OF THE ROOM, AND DONT THINK ABOUT DUSTING THE SCREEN, I THINK IT SHOULD BE OK...MAYBE TOSHIBA CAN REPLACE THE CURRENT DESIGNER FOR THE STAND..BASE NEEDS TO BE LONGER..PLASTIC IS NOT THAT EXPENSIVE..

Reviews.Title: tv is ok not to bad.
Reviews.Author: Marvin Magana "M.M"
Reviews.Content: This tv it's ok, beautyfull picture ,but is not it say,s on the manual .The only problem is the U.S.B port .Manual says enjoy music picture and video,but does not accept video att all.

Reviews.Title: Excellent piece for my PS3 with HDMI
Reviews.Author: MaShell1981
Reviews.Content: Excellent television! The price and quality cannot be found elsewhere. Toshiba is a household name and this 29 inch television is perfect for my bedroom.Video Quality 4.5/5Sound Quality 4/5Delivery Speed 5/5Features and Options 5/5

Reviews.Title: Good picture; Minor issues
Reviews.Author: Debra E. Skiles
Reviews.Content: This is a nice, very reasonably priced TV for our bedroom. The only issues we've had are that (a) need more volume levels between 0 & 1 when trying to not bother someone else sleeping in the room and (b) no headphone jack input (for our wireless headphones - only USB.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: xcpuer
Reviews.Content: Picture is all washed up, no contrast, just bright.  I will never buy a Toshiba again.  Amazon, to save your name, should not be selling this junk.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed, Great for gaming.
Reviews.Author: Allen G
Reviews.Content: This TV is truly amazing. Especially at a sub $200 price.My plans for this TV was primarily to be able to play the PS4 when it comes out. My current entertainment system (PC, 2 monitors, and a PS3 sharing one of the monitors and having to run an audio contraption to get sound) wont be able to support the PS4 and have audio so I finnaly bit the bullet and invested in a TV.After getting this TV, I dont know why I didnt just look for a bunch of 23" HDTV's like this in the first place to use as monitors. Compared to my 1080p monitors, which are the same size of the TV, this TV has a far superior picture. The colors are much richer and everything is much crisper. I was shocked at the graphics from some PS3 games and how much better they looked. I CANNOT wait to see what PS4 games look like on this baby.Once I move back out for the fall semester, I plan to make this a 3rd monitor as well as it being shared with the PS3 and PS4 when it comes out, It has 3 HDMI inputs and I dont have/desire cable television so this TV was perfect for my setup plans. It does have the functionality to pickup local Digital/Anolog signals, but you are going to need to have an antennae to pick them up. I dont believe this TV comes with an internal antennae like my older 20" "EDTV." My older TV detected most of the local channels with no antennae and this one found 0. I am assuming it needs one to be plugged into it, which is no problem, can find a decent antennae cheap if you really want to watch the local news. But most people will have some sort of cable service.If you are looking for a new PC monitor, TV for gaming, TV for a side room, TV for a camper, or any other secondary TV, this one is perfect, especially when its on sale.

Reviews.Title: Great bargain and fast delivery
Reviews.Author: Paul Esterguard
Reviews.Content: This set was a perfect fit for the stand that had a 27" older style HEAVY set. The only modification needed was to find a booster to bring the set up to perfect "eye level" when seated on our sectional sofa. The set was in perfect condition when recieved and assembly and set up were quite simple . The above description is in error as it is a 1080P set not 720P . It it hooked to our satellite system and delivers a splendid picture and very adequate sound for viewing most programming . This is not our primary movie viewing set  anyway--mostly news and sports . I had been shopping TVs for some time and at this price you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: half and half
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: We got the tv and the picture was great, but then the tv power went off and never came back.

Reviews.Title: gr8 shopping
Reviews.Author: Lynn Thompson
Reviews.Content: Would recommend to anyone amazon is a great source of shopping wit gr8 prices!!! will definitely shop again in the near future!!!!

Reviews.Title: It does not have a TV guide,
Reviews.Author: tom abbott
Reviews.Content: It does not have a TV guide, only info for current program & the next one, slow channel changes, remote has to pointed directly at TV, but good pic,very good price for 39" TV

Reviews.Title: okay, except for volume
Reviews.Author: charger350
Reviews.Content: volume has a glitch; purchased at a good price; samsung is a better tv  , if you don't mind paying more

Reviews.Title: Don't get this for your PS3 or PC
Reviews.Author: Back the Dog
Reviews.Content: I got this 23 inch version of the Toshiba 23L1350U LED HDTV for a computer/ps3 setup. When plugged in with the computer, there was a noticeable distortion in image quality. Mainly text appeared blurred, images were also a bit jagged. Adjusting cleartype text, changing video card/tv settings did not fix the problem. It was not a problem with the wires I was using. However, through research on google it seems that it is a common problem for TV's to display "blurred" computer text. (Search " Blurred text on tv when using computer").The built in sound is not terrible but not amazing either.I also used the tv for watching netflix/playing games on my PS3. Picture quality was ultra clear and was HD as far as I could tell. However, the TV had a problem with upscaling games. The thing is, most PS3 games are scaled in 720p (despite what the box says it can support). It's up to the TV's upscaler to scale it up to 1080p format. When I played "The Last of Us" on this HDTV, it looked terrible. Everything looked as if it was  being rendered in 480p. It was not a problem with my ps3 video settings or the distance I was sitting at from the TV. It genuinely looked terrible.I returned the item and bought an actual computer monitor of the same size. PS3 and PC both look sharper on that than this HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 23L1350U 23-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: jon
Reviews.Content: All good. As promised, well packed and timely delivery. I use it for my computer monitor. I have three Toshiba HDs and like them all,.

Reviews.Title: Satisfying
Reviews.Author: Eloise Middleton
Reviews.Content: I find the TV to be very satisfying. I especially enjoy watching tennis. lolok forward to watching college  women basketball. Thanks for asking.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: 5150 Shopping
Reviews.Content: I'm not a tech expert and won't even attempt to review they way some have. As for those of us who judge a product by how it looks when it is plugged in and turned on.....picture is good for the money and sound quality is about the same. It is not our primary tv and used in our bedroom. I would not recommend for primary tv but it is fine to watch to put you to sleep and the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV
Reviews.Author: Zweig
Reviews.Content: I use it for TV and extra monitor for my mac.The color is pretty good.One thing I like about it is that there are a few ports on the left side of the TV so that it was easy for me to hook it up with my mac.The only thing I don't like is that the sound output from HDMI is not as good.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV, good value
Reviews.Author: janet cutler
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my tv.  The picture and color are very good.  The sound is very average.  I had a sound system before and am considering getting a new more compact one.  I didn't realize what a difference it made.It was very easy to set up and the delivery was terrific.  A good experience all around.  I would buy from Amazon and Paul's Tv again.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and Good Sound
Reviews.Author: Edwin
Reviews.Content: I needed a small Tv, and was pleasantly surprised by this 23" Toshiba. Great picture and good sound accompanied by lots of input / output options - including 3 HDMI ports, Digital Audio Out, Digital Audio In, PC Audio In, Component video and PC in. Setup and programming was easy, though I did have to consult the online users-guide to answer a few questions.

Reviews.Title: Definitely not a Best Buy
Reviews.Author: M. Zablocki
Reviews.Content: Bought this Best Buy "deal of the week" for $299.00. I couldn't believe my luck for a 1080, 120hz HD TV. After setting it up, it was obvious why the price was so low. The picture was fuzzy on all channels and our Wii system and DVD player was nearly impossible to view due to all of the lines. Tried everything including HD cables and video component cables. Called Toshiba customer support and was on hold for 45 minutes before the phone died. Also the BB "experts" were not very helpful with advice.It's likely that we just received a bum TV, so it may not be indicative of how a non-defective Toshiba would perform. However it did seem cheaply made and customer support was poor. It nearly toppled from the flimsy plastic stand numerous times while setting it up. Took it back and got a Samsung 39." Within minutes we had a perfect picture and it seems more solid overall.

Reviews.Title: Where is the volume?
Reviews.Author: Webster
Reviews.Content: The picture is good but the  max volume is very low. My 19" Samsung LED had a sharper picture though obviously smaller.

Reviews.Title: Good TV; Cheap company
Reviews.Author: gwb1943
Reviews.Content: Everything as far as the television goes, is good to great. My problem with it is that Toshiba, in its corner cutting stupidity, does not include an Owner's Manual with the TV. I had to go online and download and print out one, all 123 pages of it!!! Toshiba does include a "quick start" guide that will let you set the TV up and get started but that's about all it does. When you look at the guide and try to find out what each button on the remote does, all the guide does is tell you what each key is. In order to find out how to use each key and what it controls, they refer you to the NOT INCLUDED, "Owner's manual". If you don't have the capability to access their website and download one, you're screwed. Basically: no computer + no guide = boat anchor for a TV. 'nuff said!!

Reviews.Title: Dead On Arrival
Reviews.Author: rlc0618
Reviews.Content: This TV might have the most amazing picture quality ever.  I'll never know because mine won't turn on.  My TV arrived today (Amazon is terrific as always!) and I excitedly opened the package and put together the stand.  The TV looks sharp, the bezel is very thin which I like.  The stand seems sturdy enough.  I connected it to my PS3, plugged it in, hit the power button and the word TOSHIBA briefly flashed across my screen.  Then... nothing.  The power indicator went dark as did the TV.  I've tried everything and nothing will bring it back to life.  The TV is dead, dead, dead.What a disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Richard J Blair
Reviews.Content: I looked at this TV at Sears and Ra-Lin's in Syracuse.  Even though I was told that Toshiba doesn"t  make its products as well asit used to(when looking at Blu-ray DVD players), I went for it and was not disappointed. Only have it one month with no problems.

Reviews.Title: the TV is excellent
Reviews.Author: Roger Principe
Reviews.Content: high quality image, sound acceptable for a tv, and is lightweight .... recommend for purchase is a good gift and it was a great pressures, and until now doing very well

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE!!!
Reviews.Author: Ricky D. Gordon "Attorney at Law"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a NEW 58" Toshiba LED TV from Paul's TV through Amazon.  I have always had great experiences purchasing through Amazon.  Last year I purchased a 73" TV and sound system from Paul's TV and the experience was extraordinary.  With the marriage of these positive experiences, I proceeded to make this recent purchase.  I ordered the TV on November 21, 2013 for delivery between November 27, 2013 and December 3, 2013.  Delivery was early on November 26, 2013.  Unfortunately, I was out of town for the Thanksgiving holiday when delivery was made at my office.  When I returned, I noted that the bottom of the box was in pretty beat-up shape and the inside styrofoam packaging was broken apart.  I actually had to tape the bottom to keep the TV from falling out.  On December 7, 2013, my audio/visual technician unpacked the TV and informed me that it was apparent that the TV had been repackaged.  That concerned me since my purchase was for a "NEW" TV.  In any event, he installed the wall mounting bracket and TV.  When the TV was turned on, we noticed a defect in the picture, an internal smear mark across the resolution of the picture.  I immediately called Paul's TV and was not impressed with the customer service representative although he did follow-through and I received a call back within 48 hours to arrange for a replacement.  I had to incur the expense of removing the TV from the mount and then having it remounted ($90 each service call = $180).  Paul's TV refused to reimburse this amount.  I even offered to take it in Paul's TV credits and they refused.  I even offered to split the cost with them and they refused.  Considering that they represented that the TV was NEW, it evidently was not.  I did not get what I bargained for and the added cost of $180 for their false representation made this a bad deal.  I could have gotten this TV locally and even with the sales tax, it would have still been a savings.  Needless to say, I was disappointed at Paul's TV's lack of good will for advertising a NEW TV and shipping me a repackaged TV.  The replacement TV arrived on December 18, 2013 (27 days after my original purchase) and it works great so I recommend the TV but not the Seller.  Buyers beware.  Although my first experience with Paul's TV was positive and brought me back for another purchase.  After this recent purchase, I will never buy or recommend Paul's TV ever again.

Reviews.Title: Bought 39 inch, Failed to work with my Wii U
Reviews.Author: neonatal1
Reviews.Content: Can not play my Wii U on this tv , May be due to refresh Frequency issue. Wii picture goes ghost .

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY FROM AMAZON!
Reviews.Author: Nuts
Reviews.Content: First the TV does not work that great. You try and change channels and it takes 30 seconds to change. Sometime the Audio does not work when you change channels. The worst part about this TV is that I received it with a broken screen. So I contacted Amazon and they sent me replacement. The shipping took extra long for the replacement.AFTER they sent me the replacement, the company JB HUNT took the broken TV back. After 30 days I got a notice from Amazon saying that they did not receive the TV back and they were going to charge my credit card again. I followed AMAZON's instructions and they are wanting to charge me AGAIN. I will never buy a TV from AMAZON again!!!!! I would not suggest anyone to buy one from them! To much work for a TV that came broken from AMAZON.

Reviews.Title: terrible customer service
Reviews.Author: K. Sheehan
Reviews.Content: I have owned this TV for less than 2 months.  I have never been happy with the picture, but 2 days ago, the sound would not work through the HDMI hooked up to an AV receiver.  I know it's the TV because the old TV still works with the same setup.  I called customer support and they had me reset the TV and the Satellite.  They claim it's the signal from the satellite not the TV.  I know this is not the case because the other TV works and I also receive no sound from my Roku or the DVD player.  When I told them I was sure it was the TV, the service rep. got huffy with me.  I told him I wanted to speak to a supervisor and he got even more indignant and would not connect me.  I have been unable to find an email address on the website to complain.I have called a local autorized dealer and will take the TV to him for repair.  I know things can go wrong, I just want the Tv repaired without hassle.  But that is not the case.

Reviews.Title: Stop working in less than a month.
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: This TV isn't even a month old and it already stopped working. I'm never buying one online again. I'd rather go to the store itself because there is no telling what they are doing to these TV's before they send it. Picture quality is good but if it could last more than a month THAT's a PLUS!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Flat Screen
Reviews.Author: Leila Candy Bradford
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a gift for myself.  It was an exceptionally hard year and I thought I'd splurge (just once). Because I was out of state for a few months, I had the TV delivered to my daughter's home.  When I returned and moved into my apartment, I went to set up the TV only to discover the flat screen was shattered.  I was not able to return it because by the time I came home, three months had passed and it was too late to return it.  I basically wasted a couple hundred dollars that I really couldn't afford to lose.  Was not able to replace it, due to no money. Very disappointed!!

Reviews.Title: Worse than my viewsonic lcd 1080p set
Reviews.Author: J. Gerhardt "design engineer"
Reviews.Content: This was rated good and it turned out to be a piece of junk. The picture is blurry compare to my lcd Viewsonic that didn't have led. Its supposed to be 1080p and looks like 720p. Hooked up my laptop and it shows the boot up windows screen on the tv when loading then goes blue on the TV showing no signal.Techs from a foreign country couldn't figure it out. The colors remind me of an old color tv that can't be adjusted and some stations have a greenish tint or trees that are bright green when other colors are subdued. The sound is crap compared to the old viewsonic set that had dolby srs tru surround sound. Says built in subwoofer, what a joke. Don't buy this and get a Viewsonic instead. More features , easier to use and menus are much better. Toshiba! Cheap! Cheap! Cheap!UPDATE 1/3/14  I have to send the set into Tosiba because techs think its a hardware problem that fails to connect to my laptop vga cable. Windows shows booting up windows on the TV but says Auto Adjusting in blue and goes to no signal after windows boots up on the set. The remote is also junk. It always goes to 25.1 instead of 25 if you type it on the keypad or 43.1 instead of channel 43 if you type it on the keypad.Sometimes if I am using the down key on the channel arrows when it hits channel 49.1 it flashed 77 channel display and goes to channel 3.1 instead of the next channel lower which is 45. So the remote is weak and a piece of junk also because you cannot use the back button to get a numerical channel becuase it will jump to a .1 channel and you have to down arrow it again. My viewsonic set just displayed the number analog or digital as a single digit and not all the garbage this set puts on to the screen and was faster with no delay lag time like the Toshiba.

Reviews.Author: brandon
Reviews.Content: it is very I am enjoying it very much and I really love it thanks a whole lot appreciate it

Reviews.Title: 29" Model Picture Failed after 10 weeks
Reviews.Author: T. Muldowney "Car Guy"
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for our rental condo in Florida. Bought it at H.H. Gregg. After 10 weeks it had no picture. The manager of our rental unit kindly took it back to H.H. Gregg to get a replacement only to be told: " you have to send it back to Toshiba". He called Toshiba and they were equally unhelpful. We will throw this new TV and buy one of the top rated (by customers) Samsung or LG TV's. No more H.H. Gregg or Toshiba TV's for us...ever!

Reviews.Title: No User's Guide
Reviews.Author: SlickNick
Reviews.Content: Bought this from the guys in yellow and blue.  Same price as Amazon.  Very pleased with ease of set-up and picture quality.  Very annoyed to be compelled to go online and download the User's Guide.  What could it have cost Toshiba to include a hard copy of essential technical information?  25 cents?  How bush league..  Will definitely ask more questions when considering a Toshiba again..

Reviews.Title: Highly Upset
Reviews.Author: King Son
Reviews.Content: I just received this order and I am very upset because it is not the product that you advertised. First of all, it is not new, secondly it is not a 32 inch Toshiba, it is 28.5 inches....you guys misrepresented this item on your site and it is unprofessional.I ordered this TV for my wife as a gift and she was very disappointed as well.I want a refund on this item or replace forth with with the 32 inch Toshiba as you have advertised on your site....I cannot give a good review on this thing because it is not what I ordered.....Anthony

Reviews.Title: claimed it was 1080.......
Reviews.Author: Brian Koon
Reviews.Content: when you check its a 720 native.... Thanks for lying. It says 720p now, but when I bought these it said could do 1080. I feel screwed and wasted money buying two of these useless piles of junk. I appreciate the opportunity to buy something outdated and be lied to..

Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: Jerry McClintock
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV believing that Toshiba would be a reliable brand. Everything worked well until I turned off the TV. When I turned it back on, there was no sound. I switched HDMI ports and cables to no avail. Toshiba customer support actually told me that "it is a defective unit". Thanks for the help!! My first and last Toshiba purchase.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this tv!
Reviews.Author: carolc84
Reviews.Content: Toshiba TV's are awful! They only made them to last a couple of years max. Their technical support is useless. Never buy a toshiba!

Reviews.Title: Bad support, neither video playing from USB, nor 3D
Reviews.Author: yajing peng
Reviews.Content: The TV do not support play video from USB storage. I think the seller should tell us the TV's fault, but they did not. Further, I don't think the color and sound are good enough.
